SECTION.DESC: Detect when the device changes orientation

CODE.RUBY:
def start_detecting_orientation_changes Rho::ScreenOrientation.setScreenOrientationEvent(url_for(:action => :orientation_callback)) end
def orientation_callback Alert.show_popup("The screen changed orientation") end
